span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;
font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 24px;
span.strong: Special Called Board Meeting Monday, 4-20-2020 5:30 p.m.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

div.span:
To view this event just click the link below:
https://boxcast.tv/view/special-called-meeting-4-20-2020-579418

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; letter-spacing: normal; text-align: center;
p.span: If the above URL does not work try copying and pasting it into your browser.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: New Diana ISD Major Update, April 17, 2020

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Governor Abbott issued an order that all schools will be closed the remainder of this school year.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Instruction to students will continue during this time.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial;

p.span: Meals will continue to be provided 10:30 am-1:00 pm with 2 meals provided on Mondays and 3 meals provided on Wednesdays.

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has outlined the need for all communities to implement a social distancing protocol. We want to reiterate a request to our broader community to take the following reasonable precautions to prevent the spread of the illness:

li.span: Limit movement within the community, especially avoiding crowded placed and maintaining 6 ft of distance between people
If you are moving around in the community, dont congregate in groups of 10 or more

span.style: font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(5, 99, 193);
text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(5, 99, 193);

li.span: of COVID-19, call your health care provider for medical advice .
Do not leave the house if you are ill, except to access medical care

p.span: This is a quickly changing situation, and we will continue to monitor information as it comes through.
Thank you for your support and cooperation as we ensure that all members of the New Diana ISD community stay safe and healthy.

span.style: font-size: 10pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center; font-family: latobold; color: rgb(15, 36, 62);

span.strong: New Diana ISD is proud to partner together with Kilgore College and LeTourneau University to provide dual credit opportunities for our high school students.

br.style: color: rgb(36, 64, 97); font-size: medium; letter-spacing: 0.3px; text-align: center;
